nodes.text: BR-RR was an R5-series astromech droid that was around during the Clone Wars. This unit was decorated and used during Life Day celebrations, in particular resembling a snowman, with Life Day also being considered its favorite time of year because of this.
BR-RR is a droid Companion in Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures that was released on December 30, 2011. When used on the battlefield, it grants its owner a Force Regen Up boost.
